Sequence Information.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from the C-terminal sequence of α1-antitrypsin)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.22406118]HIV-1 IIIB:inhibition of virus replication(IC50>100 μM);inhibition of cell-cell fusion between H9/HIV-1IIIB cells and MT-2 cells(IC50>200 μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Short cyclic peptides derived from the C-terminal sequence of α1-antitrypsin exhibit significant anti-HIV-1 activity.
Literature.Author: Jia Q, Jiang X, Yu F, Qiu J, Kang X, Cai L, Li L, Shi W, Liu S, Jiang S, Liu K.
